about_body: This website is designed and made by Zana Masood as a product list instead of using old fashioned papers to show the prices, points and images of each product. also since the prices change everyday instead of people asking about the prices every 2 minutes this makes the job easier for the seller and buyer.
contact_body: If you have any questions about the products or your orders feel free to ask me on the number below.
contact_programmer_body: If you want to make an application or website for your business feel free to contact me with the options below.
